trans-unit.source: Specifies a set of values that are used when you start a process.
trans-unit.target: Angir et sett med verdier som brukes når du starter en prosess.

trans-unit.source: ProcessStartInfo is used together with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: ProcessStartInfo brukes sammen med den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>komponent.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: When you start a process using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> class, you have access to process information in addition to that available when attaching to a running process.
trans-unit.target: Når du starter en prosess ved hjelp av <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>klasse, du har tilgang til å behandle informasjon i tillegg til som er tilgjengelig når du kobler til en prosess som kjører.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ProcessStartInfo class for better control over the process you start.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke klassen ProcessStartInfo for bedre kontroll over du starte prosessen.

trans-unit.source: You must at least set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property, either manually or using the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Du må minst angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen, enten manuelt eller bruker konstruktøren.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file name is any application or document.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet er et program eller dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Here a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Her er et dokument definert for alle filtyper som har en åpen eller standard handling knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise registrerte filtyper og tilknyttede programmer for datamaskinen ved hjelp av den **Mappealternativer** dialogboksen, som er tilgjengelig via operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type.
trans-unit.target: Den **avansert** knappen fører til en dialogboks som viser om det er en åpen handling knyttet til en bestemt registrert filtype.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can set other properties that define actions to take with that file.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du angi andre egenskaper som definerer handlinger som skal utføres med filen.

trans-unit.source: You can specify a value specific to the type of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en verdi som er spesifikke for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify "print" for a document type.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi "ut" for en dokumenttype.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can specify <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A> property values to be command-line arguments to pass to the file's open procedure.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A>egenskapsverdier skal kommandolinjeargumenter som sendes til filens åpne prosedyren.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a text editor application in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property, you can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A> property to specify a text file to be opened by the editor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir et program i redigeringsprogrammet for tekst i for eksempel den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>-egenskapen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A>til å angi en tekstfil til er åpen i redigeringsprogrammet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Standard input is usually the keyboard, and standard output and standard error are usually the monitor screen.
trans-unit.target: Standard inndata er vanligvis tastaturet, og standard utdata og standard feilen er vanligvis av skjerm.

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardInput%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> properties to cause the process to get input from or return output to a file or other device.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardInput%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A>, og <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A>egenskapene som skal føre til at prosessen for å få tilbakemelding fra, eller Returner utdata til en fil eller en annen enhet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> properties on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component, you must first set the corresponding value on the ProcessStartInfo property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>, eller <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>Egenskaper i den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>komponent, må du først angi den tilsvarende verdien på egenskapen ProcessStartInfo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the system throws an exception when you read or write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Ellers oppstår systemet det et unntak under du lese eller skrive til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to specify whether to start the process by using the operating system shell.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>til å angi om du vil starte prosessen ved hjelp av operativsystemet-grensesnittet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of any ProcessStartInfo property up to the time that the process starts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre verdien for egenskapen noen ProcessStartInfo opptil gang prosessen starter.

trans-unit.source: After you start the process, changing these values has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når du har startet prosessen, har endring av disse verdiene ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne klassen inneholder en kobling behov på klassen nivået som gjelder for alle medlemmer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes når umiddelbar oppkalleren ikke har tillatelse for fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om krav for sikkerhet, kan du se [koblingen krav](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo"></xref> class without specifying a file name with which to start the process.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo"> </xref> klasse uten å angi et navn som skal starte prosessen med.

trans-unit.source: You must set at least the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property before you start the process.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi minst feltet <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen før du starter.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file name is any application or document.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet er et program eller dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet er et dokument definert for alle filtyper som har en åpen eller standard handling knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise registrerte filtyper og tilknyttede programmer for datamaskinen ved hjelp av den **Mappealternativer** dialogboksen, som er tilgjengelig via operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type.
trans-unit.target: Den **avansert** knappen fører til en dialogboks som viser om det er en åpen handling knyttet til en bestemt registrert filtype.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can also set other properties before you start the process.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt også angi andre egenskaper før du begynner prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A> property supplies actions to take, such as "print", with the file indicated in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A>egenskapen leverer handlinger som må utføres, for eksempel "print" med filen som er angitt i den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A> property supplies a way to pass command-line arguments to the file when the system opens it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A>Egenskapen leverer en måte å sende kommandolinjeargumenter til filen når systemet åpner det.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo"></xref> class and specifies a file name such as an application or document with which to start the process.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo"> </xref> klasse og angir et filnavn for eksempel program eller dokument som du kan starte prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The file name is any application or document.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet er et program eller dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet er et dokument definert for alle filtyper som har en åpen eller standard handling knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise registrerte filtyper og tilknyttede programmer for datamaskinen ved hjelp av den **Mappealternativer** dialogboksen, som er tilgjengelig via operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type.
trans-unit.target: Den **avansert** knappen fører til en dialogboks som viser om det er en åpen handling knyttet til en bestemt registrert filtype.

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property after you call this constructor, up to the time that the process starts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen når du kaller denne konstruktøren, opptil gang prosessen starter.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you start the process, changing these values has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når du har startet prosessen, har endring av disse verdiene ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: An application or document with which to start a process.
trans-unit.target: Et program eller dokumentet som skal starte en prosess med.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo"></xref> class, specifies an application file name with which to start the process, and specifies a set of command-line arguments to pass to the application.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo"> </xref> klasse, angir et filnavn for applikasjonen som skal starte prosessen med, og angir et sett med kommandolinjeargumenter som sendes til programmet.

trans-unit.source: The file name is any application or document.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet er et program eller dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet er et dokument definert for alle filtyper som har en åpen eller standard handling knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise registrerte filtyper og tilknyttede programmer for datamaskinen ved hjelp av den **Mappealternativer** dialogboksen, som er tilgjengelig via operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type.
trans-unit.target: Den **avansert** knappen fører til en dialogboks som viser om det er en åpen handling knyttet til en bestemt registrert filtype.

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A> properties after you call this constructor, up to the time that the process starts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>eller <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A>Egenskaper når du kaller denne konstruktøren, opptil gang prosessen starter.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you start the process, changing these values has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når du har startet prosessen, har endring av disse verdiene ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: An application with which to start a process.
trans-unit.target: Et program som skal starte en prosess med.

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments to pass to the application when the process starts.
trans-unit.target: Kommandolinjeargumenter som sendes til programmet når prosessen starter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of command-line arguments to use when starting the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir settet med kommandolinjeargumenter som brukes for å starte programmet.

trans-unit.source: A single string containing the arguments to pass to the target application specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*> property.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt streng som inneholder argumenter som sendes til målprogrammet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: On Windows Vista and earlier versions of the Windows operating system, the length of the arguments added to the length of the full path to the process must be less than 2080.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på argumentene legges til lengden på den fullstendige banen til prosessen må være mindre enn 2080 på Windows Vista og tidligere versjoner av Windows-operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: On Windows 7 and later versions, the length must be less than 32699.
trans-unit.target: Lengden må være mindre enn 32699 på Windows 7 og nyere versjoner.

trans-unit.source: Arguments are parsed and interpreted by the target application, so must align with the expectations of that application.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter analysere og tolkes av målprogrammet, slik at justeres med forventet til dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: For.NET applications as demonstrated in the Examples below, spaces are interpreted as a separator between multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: For.NET programmer som har vist i eksemplene nedenfor, tolkes mellomrom som skilletegn mellom flere argumenter.

trans-unit.source: A single argument that includes spaces must be surrounded by quotation marks, but those quotation marks are not carried through to the target application.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt argument som inneholder mellomrom, må stå i anførselstegn, men disse anførselstegn er ikke overført til målprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: In include quotation marks in the final parsed argument, triple-escape each mark.
trans-unit.target: Inkluder i anførselstegn i endelige analysert argument, tre ganger escape hver merke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to start the process in a new window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å starte denne prosessen i et nytt vindu.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> property is `true` or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Password%2A> properties are not `null`, the CreateNoWindow property value is ignored and a new window is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>egenskapen `true` eller <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UserName%2A>og <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Password%2A>Egenskaper er ikke `null`CreateNoWindow egenskapsverdien ignoreres og et nytt vindu er opprettet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Password%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UserName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the process should be started without creating a new window to contain it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du skal starte prosessen uten å opprette et nytt vindu som inneholder den. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the domain to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som identifiserer domenet som skal brukes for å starte prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory domain to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory-domenet skal brukes ved oppstart av.

trans-unit.source: The domain property is primarily of interest to users within enterprise environments that use Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen domenet er primært interessant for brukere i enterprise-miljøer som bruker Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the environment variables that apply to this process and its child processes.
trans-unit.target: Henter miljøvariabler som gjelder for denne prosessen og de underordnede prosessene.

trans-unit.source: A generic dictionary containing the environment variables that apply to this process and its child processes.
trans-unit.target: En generell ordliste som inneholder miljøvariablene som gjelder for denne prosessen og de underordnede prosessene.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets search paths for files, directories for temporary files, application-specific options, and other similar information.
trans-unit.target: Henter Søk baner for filer, mapper for midlertidige filer, programspesifikk alternativer og andre lignende informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Although you cannot set the EnvironmentVariables property, you can modify the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary> returned by the property.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du ikke kan angi egenskapen EnvironmentVariables, kan du endre den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary>returneres av egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code adds a TempPath environment variable: `myProcess.StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables.Add("TempPath", "C:\\Temp")`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende kode legger til en miljøvariabel TempPath: `myProcess.StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables.Add("TempPath", "C:\\Temp")`.

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> property to `false` to start the process after changing the EnvironmentVariables property.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>egenskapen `false` systemfeilkoden når du har endret egenskapen EnvironmentVariables.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> is `true`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>er `true`, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>oppstår når er den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string dictionary that provides environment variables that apply to this process and child processes.
trans-unit.target: En streng ordliste som gir miljøvariabler som gjelder for denne prosessen og underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an error dialog box is displayed to the user if the process cannot be started.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en feildialogboksen vises for brukeren hvis prosessen ikke kan startes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an error dialog box should be displayed on the screen if the process cannot be started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en feildialogboksen skal vises på skjermen hvis ikke kan starte prosessen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window handle to use when an error dialog box is shown for a process that cannot be started.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vindusreferansen skal brukes når en feildialogboksen vises for en prosess som ikke kan startes.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.ErrorDialog%2A> is `true`, the ErrorDialogParentHandle property specifies the parent window for the dialog box that is shown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.ErrorDialog%2A>er `true`, angir egenskapen ErrorDialogParentHandle det overordnede vinduet for dialogboksen som vises.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.ErrorDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is useful to specify a parent to keep the dialog box in front of the application.
trans-unit.target: Det er lurt å angi en overordnet for å beholde dialogboksen foran programmet.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the handle of the error dialog box that results from a process start failure.
trans-unit.target: En peker til håndtaket for feildialogboksen resultater fra en prosess starte feil.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application or document to start.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir programmet eller dokumentet til å starte.

trans-unit.source: You must set at least the FileName property before you start the process.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi minst egenskapen FileName før du begynner prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The file name is any application or document.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet er et program eller dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: A document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Et dokument er definert for alle filtyper som har en åpen eller standard handling knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise registrerte filtyper og tilknyttede programmer for datamaskinen ved hjelp av den **Mappealternativer** dialogboksen, som er tilgjengelig via operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type.
trans-unit.target: Den **avansert** knappen fører til en dialogboks som viser om det er en åpen handling knyttet til en bestemt registrert filtype.

trans-unit.source: The set of file types available to you depends in part on the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Settet med tilgjengelige filtyper avhenger delvis av verdien for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> is `true`, you can start any document and perform operations on the file, such as printing, with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>er `true`, kan du starte alle dokumenter og utføre operasjoner på filen, for eksempel skriver ut, med den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>komponent.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> is `false`, you can start only executables with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>er `false`, kan du starte bare kjørbare filer med den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>komponent.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can start a ClickOnce application by setting the FileName property to the location (for example, a Web address) from which you originally installed the application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan starte ClickOnce-programmet ved å angi egenskapen FileName dit (for eksempel en webadresse) som du installerte programmet.

trans-unit.source: Do not start a ClickOnce application by specifying its installed location on your hard disk.
trans-unit.target: Start ikke ClickOnce-programmet ved å angi plasseringen installert på harddisken.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application to start, or the name of a document of a file type that is associated with an application and that has a default open action available to it.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på programmet som skal starte, eller navnet på et dokument som en filtype som er tilknyttet et program, og som har en standardverdi åpne handling som er tilgjengelig i den.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Windows user profile is to be loaded from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om Windows-brukerprofilen skal lastes inn fra registret.

trans-unit.source: This property is referenced if the process is being started by using the user name, password, and domain.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen refereres Hvis prosessen startes ved hjelp av brukernavn, passord og domene.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `true`, the user's profile in the `HKEY_USERS` registry key is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `true`, brukerprofil i den `HKEY_USERS` registernøkkelen er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: Loading the profile can be time-consuming.
trans-unit.target: Kan ta tid å laste inn profilen.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is best to use this value only if you must access the information in the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` registry key.
trans-unit.target: Derfor er det best å bruke denne verdien bare hvis du må få tilgang til informasjonen i den `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` registernøkkel.

trans-unit.source: In Windows Server 2003 and Windows 2000, the profile is unloaded after the new process has been terminated, regardless of whether the process has created child processes.
trans-unit.target: Profilen er fjernet i Windows Server 2003 og Windows 2000 etter at den nye prosessen er avsluttet, uavhengig om prosessen har opprettet underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: In Windows XP, the profile is unloaded after the new process and all child processes it has created have been terminated.
trans-unit.target: Profilen er fjernet etter den nye prosessen i Windows XP, og alle underordnede prosesser som den har opprettet er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Windows user profile should be loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Windows brukerprofilen skal lastes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a secure string that contains the user password to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en sikker streng som inneholder brukerpassordet som skal brukes når du starter prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The user password to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Brukerpassordet som skal brukes når du starter prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user password in clear text to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir brukerpassord i klartekst skal brukes ved oppstart av.

trans-unit.source: The user password in clear text.
trans-unit.target: Brukerpassord i ren tekst.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the error output of an application is written to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feil resultatet av en applikasjon, skrives til det <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A?displayProperty=fullName> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes text to its standard error stream, that text is typically displayed on the console.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>skriver tekst til den standard feilflyt teksten vises vanligvis i konsollen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: By redirecting the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, you can manipulate or suppress the error output of a process.
trans-unit.target: Ved å omdirigere den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>dataflyten du kan endre eller undertrykke feil resultatet av en prosess.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can filter the text, format it differently, or write the output to both the console and a designated log file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel filtrere teksten, formaterer det på en annen måte, eller skrive utdataene både konsollen og en angitt loggfil.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false` if you want to set RedirectStandardError to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du angi <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>til `false` Hvis du vil angi RedirectStandardError `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, reading from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Ellers lesing fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>dataflyten oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: The redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Den omadresserte <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>kan kopiere dataflyten synkron eller asynkron.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the error output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: Metoder som <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>og <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>utføre synkron leseoperasjoner i utdata feilflyt av prosessen.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Disse synkron lese operasjoner ikke fyller ut før den tilknyttede <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>skriver til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>flyten eller lukker dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>starter Asynkrone leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables a designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjør det mulig for en angitt hendelsesbehandling for dataflyten-utdata, og returnerer umiddelbart til oppkalleren, som kan utføre andre arbeid mens utdataene dataflyten er rettet mot hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Programmet som behandler asynkrone utdataene kalle den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>metode for å sikre at utdatabufferen har blitt tømt.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Synchronous read operations introduce a dependency between the caller reading from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream and the child process writing to that stream.
trans-unit.target: Synkron lese operasjoner introduserer en avhengighet mellom oppkalleren lesing fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>strøm- og barnet behandle skriving til denne dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: These dependencies can cause deadlock conditions.
trans-unit.target: Disse avhengighetene kan føre til vranglås betingelser.

trans-unit.source: When the caller reads from the redirected stream of a child process, it is dependent on the child.
trans-unit.target: Når oppkalleren leser fra omadresserte dataflyten for en underordnet prosess, er det avhengige barnet.

trans-unit.source: The caller waits for the read operation until the child writes to the stream or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren venter på leseoperasjonen inntil barnet skriver til dataflyten eller lukker dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: When the child process writes enough data to fill its redirected stream, it is dependent on the parent.
trans-unit.target: Når den underordnede prosessen skriver nok data til å fylle den omadresserte dataflyten, er det avhengige av overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The child process waits for the next write operation until the parent reads from the full stream or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede prosessen venter på neste Skriveoperasjonen til overordnet leser fra fullstendig dataflyten eller lukker dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The deadlock condition results when the caller and child process wait for each other to complete an operation, and neither can continue.
trans-unit.target: Vranglås betingelsen resultater når oppkalleren og underordnet prosess venter hverandre for å fullføre en operasjon, og ingen kan fortsette.

trans-unit.source: You can avoid deadlocks by evaluating dependencies between the caller and child process.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå vranglås ved evaluering av avhengigheter mellom oppkaller og underordnet prosess.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code shows how to read from a redirected stream and wait for the child process to exit.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel viser C# koden nedenfor hvordan du lese fra en omadressert dataflyt og venter til den underordnede prosessen å avslutte.

trans-unit.source: ``` // Start the child process. Process p = new Process(); // Redirect the error stream of the child process. p.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false; p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError = true; p.StartInfo.FileName = "Write500Lines.exe"; p.Start(); // Do not wait for the child process to exit before // reading to the end of its redirected error stream. // p.WaitForExit(); // Read the error stream first and then wait. string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ``` The code example avoids a deadlock condition by calling `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` before `p.WaitForExit`.
trans-unit.target: ``` // Start the child process. Process p = new Process(); // Redirect the error stream of the child process. p.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false; p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError = true; p.StartInfo.FileName = "Write500Lines.exe"; p.Start(); // Do not wait for the child process to exit before // reading to the end of its redirected error stream. // p.WaitForExit(); // Read the error stream first and then wait. string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ```Kodeeksemplet unngår en vranglås betingelse ved å kalle `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` før `p.WaitForExit`.

trans-unit.source: A deadlock condition can result if the parent process calls `p.WaitForExit` before `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill the redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: En vranglås betingelse kan skje hvis overordnet behandle kall `p.WaitForExit` før `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` og underordnet prosess skriver nok tekst for å fylle omdirigerte dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to exit.
trans-unit.target: Den overordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid for den underordnede prosessen å avslutte.

trans-unit.source: The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid for overordnet å lese fra fullstendige <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a similar issue when you read all text from both the standard output and standard error streams.
trans-unit.target: Det er et lignende problem når du lese alle text fra standard utdata og standard feil dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code performs a read operation on both streams.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel utfører følgende C# kode en leseoperasjon på begge dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: ``` // Do not perform a synchronous read to the end of both // redirected streams. // string output = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd(); // string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); // p.WaitForExit(); // Use asynchronous read operations on at least one of the streams. p.BeginOutputReadLine(); string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ``` The code example avoids the deadlock condition by performing asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: ``` // Do not perform a synchronous read to the end of both // redirected streams. // string output = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd(); // string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); // p.WaitForExit(); // Use asynchronous read operations on at least one of the streams. p.BeginOutputReadLine(); string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ```Kodeeksemplet unngår betingelsen vranglås ved å utføre Asynkrone leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: A deadlock condition results if the parent process calls `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` followed by `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill its error stream.
trans-unit.target: En vranglås betingelse resultat hvis overordnet behandle kall `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` etterfulgt av `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` og underordnet prosess skriver nok tekst slik at det fyller feilflyt.

trans-unit.source: The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to close its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Den overordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid underordnet prosess å lukke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid for overordnet å lese fra fullstendige <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use asynchronous read operations to avoid these dependencies and their deadlock potential.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke Asynkrone leseoperasjoner unngå disse avhengigheter og deres potensielle vranglås.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can avoid the deadlock condition by creating two threads and reading the output of each stream on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt unngå betingelsen vranglås ved oppretting av to tråder og lese utdataene til hver dataflyt i en egen tråd.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if error output should be written to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feilutdata må skrives til <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the input for an application is read from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om inndata for et program er lest fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A?displayProperty=fullName> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> can read input text from its standard input stream, typically the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>kan lese inndatateksten fra den standard inndatastrømmen, vanligvis tastaturet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: By redirecting the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A> stream, you can programmatically specify the input of a process.
trans-unit.target: Ved å omdirigere den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>dataflyten programmatisk kan du angi inndataene til en prosess.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of using keyboard input, you can provide text from the contents of a designated file or output from another application.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i stedet for bruker inndata fra tastaturet, kan du lage tekst fra innholdet i en angitt fil eller utdata fra et annet program.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false` if you want to set RedirectStandardInput to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du angi <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>til `false` Hvis du vil angi RedirectStandardInput `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, writing to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A> stream throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke skriving til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>dataflyten oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if input should be read from <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis inndataene kan lese fra <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the textual output of an application is written to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den tekstbaserte resultatet av en applikasjon, skrives til det <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A?displayProperty=fullName> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes text to its standard stream, that text is typically displayed on the console.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>skriver tekst til den standard dataflyten teksten vises vanligvis i konsollen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: By setting RedirectStandardOutput to `true` to redirect the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, you can manipulate or suppress the output of a process.
trans-unit.target: Ved å angi RedirectStandardOutput `true` å omdirigere den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten du kan endre eller undertrykke resultatet av en prosess.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can filter the text, format it differently, or write the output to both the console and a designated log file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel filtrere teksten, formaterer det på en annen måte, eller skrive utdataene både konsollen og en angitt loggfil.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false` if you want to set RedirectStandardOutput to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du angi <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>til `false` Hvis du vil angi RedirectStandardOutput `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, reading from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Ellers lesing fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Den omadresserte <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>kan kopiere dataflyten synkron eller asynkron.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: Metoder som <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>utføre synkron leseoperasjoner i output-dataflyt av prosessen.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Disse synkron lese operasjoner ikke fyller ut før den tilknyttede <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>skriver til den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>flyten eller lukker dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>starter Asynkrone leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables a designated event handler (see <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>) for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det angitte hendelsesbehandlingen (se <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>) for dataflyten utdata og umiddelbart går tilbake til oppkalleren, som kan utføre andre arbeid mens utdataene dataflyten er rettet mot hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Programmet som behandler asynkrone utdataene kalle den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>metode for å sikre at utdatabufferen har blitt tømt.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Synchronous read operations introduce a dependency between the caller reading from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream and the child process writing to that stream.
trans-unit.target: Synkron lese operasjoner introduserer en avhengighet mellom oppkalleren lesing fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>strøm- og barnet behandle skriving til denne dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: These dependencies can cause deadlock conditions.
trans-unit.target: Disse avhengighetene kan føre til vranglås betingelser.

trans-unit.source: When the caller reads from the redirected stream of a child process, it is dependent on the child.
trans-unit.target: Når oppkalleren leser fra omadresserte dataflyten for en underordnet prosess, er det avhengige barnet.

trans-unit.source: The caller waits for the read operation until the child writes to the stream or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren venter på leseoperasjonen inntil barnet skriver til dataflyten eller lukker dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: When the child process writes enough data to fill its redirected stream, it is dependent on the parent.
trans-unit.target: Når den underordnede prosessen skriver nok data til å fylle den omadresserte dataflyten, er det avhengige av overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The child process waits for the next write operation until the parent reads from the full stream or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede prosessen venter på neste Skriveoperasjonen til overordnet leser fra fullstendig dataflyten eller lukker dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The deadlock condition results when the caller and child process wait for each other to complete an operation, and neither can continue.
trans-unit.target: Vranglås betingelsen resultater når oppkalleren og underordnet prosess venter hverandre for å fullføre en operasjon, og ingen kan fortsette.

trans-unit.source: You can avoid deadlocks by evaluating dependencies between the caller and child process.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå vranglås ved evaluering av avhengigheter mellom oppkaller og underordnet prosess.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code shows how to read from a redirected stream and wait for the child process to exit.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel viser C# koden nedenfor hvordan du lese fra en omadressert dataflyt og venter til den underordnede prosessen å avslutte.

trans-unit.source: ``` Process p = new Process(); p.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false; p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true; p.StartInfo.FileName = "Write500Lines.exe"; p.Start(); // To avoid deadlocks, always read the output stream first and then wait. string output = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ``` The code example avoids a deadlock condition by calling `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` before `p.WaitForExit`.
trans-unit.target: ``` Process p = new Process(); p.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false; p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true; p.StartInfo.FileName = "Write500Lines.exe"; p.Start(); // To avoid deadlocks, always read the output stream first and then wait. string output = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ```Kodeeksemplet unngår en vranglås betingelse ved å kalle `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` før `p.WaitForExit`.

trans-unit.source: A deadlock condition can result if the parent process calls `p.WaitForExit` before `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill the redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: En vranglås betingelse kan skje hvis overordnet behandle kall `p.WaitForExit` før `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` og underordnet prosess skriver nok tekst for å fylle omdirigerte dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to exit.
trans-unit.target: Den overordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid for den underordnede prosessen å avslutte.

trans-unit.source: The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid for overordnet å lese fra fullstendige <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a similar issue when you read all text from both the standard output and standard error streams.
trans-unit.target: Det er et lignende problem når du lese alle text fra standard utdata og standard feil dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code performs a read operation on both streams.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel utfører følgende C# kode en leseoperasjon på begge dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: ``` // To avoid deadlocks, use asynchronous read operations on at least one of the streams. // Do not perform a synchronous read to the end of both redirected streams. p.BeginOutputReadLine(); string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ``` The code example avoids the deadlock condition by performing asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: ``` // To avoid deadlocks, use asynchronous read operations on at least one of the streams. // Do not perform a synchronous read to the end of both redirected streams. p.BeginOutputReadLine(); string error = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd(); p.WaitForExit(); ```Kodeeksemplet unngår betingelsen vranglås ved å utføre Asynkrone leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: A deadlock condition results if the parent process calls `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` followed by `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill its error stream.
trans-unit.target: En vranglås betingelse resultat hvis overordnet behandle kall `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` etterfulgt av `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` og underordnet prosess skriver nok tekst slik at det fyller feilflyt.

trans-unit.source: The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to close its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Den overordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid underordnet prosess å lukke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede prosessen vil vente på ubestemt tid for overordnet å lese fra fullstendige <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>dataflyten.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use asynchronous read operations to avoid these dependencies and their deadlock potential.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke Asynkrone leseoperasjoner unngå disse avhengigheter og deres potensielle vranglås.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can avoid the deadlock condition by creating two threads and reading the output of each stream on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt unngå betingelsen vranglås ved oppretting av to tråder og lese utdataene til hver dataflyt i en egen tråd.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if output should be written to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utdata må skrives til <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred encoding for error output.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den foretrukne kodingen for feilutdata.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the StandardErrorEncoding property is `null`, the process uses the default standard error encoding for error output.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for egenskapen StandardErrorEncoding `null`, prosessen bruker standard feil standardkodingen for feilutdata.

trans-unit.source: The StandardErrorEncoding property must be set before the process is started.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StandardErrorEncoding må angis før prosessen er startet.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not guarantee that the process will use the specified encoding; the process will use only those encodings that it supports.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen er det ikke sikkert at prosessen vil bruke den angitte kodingen; prosessen vil bruke bare koding den støtter.

trans-unit.source: The application should be tested to determine which encodings are supported.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjonen som skal testes for å finne ut hvilken koding støttes.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the preferred encoding for error output.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den foretrukne kodingen for feilutdata.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred encoding for standard output.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den foretrukne kodingen for standard utdata.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the StandardOutputEncoding property is `null`, the process uses the default standard output encoding for the standard output.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for egenskapen StandardOutputEncoding `null`, prosessen bruker standard utdata standardkodingen for standard utdata.

trans-unit.source: The StandardOutputEncoding property must be set before the process is started.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StandardOutputEncoding må angis før prosessen er startet.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not guarantee that the process will use the specified encoding.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen er det ikke sikkert at prosessen vil bruke den angitte kodingen.

trans-unit.source: The application should be tested to determine which encodings the process supports.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjonen som skal testes for å finne ut hvilken koding prosessen støtter.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the preferred encoding for standard output.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den foretrukne kodingen for standard utdata.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name to be used when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir brukernavnet som skal brukes ved oppstart av.

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet som skal brukes for å starte prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the operating system shell to start the process.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil bruke operativsystemet-grensesnittet ikke starte prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` enables you to redirect input, output, and error streams.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `false` kan du omadressere inndata, output og feil dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > UseShellExecute must be `false` if the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UserName%2A> property is not `null` or an empty string, or an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%28System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > UseShellExecute må være `false` hvis den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UserName%2A>egenskapen er ikke `null` eller en tom streng eller et <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vil bli utløst når den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%28System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo%29?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%28System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the operating system shell to start processes, you can start any document (which is any registered file type associated with an executable that has a default open action) and perform operations on the file, such as printing, by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker operativsystemet grensesnittet for å starte prosesser, kan du starte alle dokumenter (som alle registrerte filtyper som er knyttet til en kjørbar fil som har en åpen standardhandling) og utføre operasjoner på filen, for eksempel skriver ut, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>objektet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: When UseShellExecute is `false`, you can start only executables by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object.
trans-unit.target: Når UseShellExecute er `false`, kan du starte bare kjørbare filer ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>objektet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > UseShellExecute must be `true` if you set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.ErrorDialog%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > UseShellExecute må være `true` Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.ErrorDialog%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.ErrorDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A> property behaves differently depending on the value of the UseShellExecute property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>egenskapen virkemåten forskjellig avhengig av verdien for egenskapen UseShellExecute.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: When UseShellExecute is `true`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A> property specifies the location of the executable.
trans-unit.target: Når UseShellExecute er `true`, <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>egenskapen angir plasseringen for den kjørbare filen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A> is an empty string, it is assumed that the current directory contains the executable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>er en tom streng antas det at gjeldende katalog inneholder den kjørbare filen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: When UseShellExecute is `false`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A> property is not used to find the executable.
trans-unit.target: Når UseShellExecute er `false`, <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>egenskapen brukes ikke til å finne den kjørbare filen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.WorkingDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is used only by the process that is started and has meaning only within the context of the new process.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes i stedet bare av prosessen som er startet og har betydning bare i konteksten til den nye prosessen.

trans-unit.source: When UseShellExecute is `false`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property can be either a fully qualified path to the executable, or a simple executable name that the system will attempt to find within folders specified by the PATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: Når UseShellExecute er `false`, <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>kan ha en fullstendig bane til den kjørbare filen eller enkelt kjørbare navn som systemet prøver å finne i mapper som er angitt i PATH-miljøvariabelen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the shell should be used when starting the process; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the process should be created directly from the executable file.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis grensesnittet som skal brukes ved oppstart av; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis prosessen skal opprettes direkte fra den kjørbare filen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the verb to use when opening the application or document specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verbet skal brukes når du åpner programmet eller dokumentet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>

trans-unit.source: Each file name extension has its own set of verbs, which can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hver filtype har et eget sett med verb som kan oppnås ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the "`print`" verb will print a document specified by using <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den "`print`" verbet skrives ut et dokument som ble angitt ved hjelp av <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default verb can be specified by using an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverbet kan angis ved hjelp av en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Examples of verbs are "Edit", "Open", "OpenAsReadOnly", "Print", and "Printto".
trans-unit.target: Eksempler på verb er "Rediger", "Åpne", "OpenAsReadOnly", "Print" og "Printto".

trans-unit.source: You should use only verbs that appear in the set of verbs returned by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke bare verb som vises i settet med verb som returneres av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the Verb property, you must include the file name extension when you set the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker egenskapen Verb, du må inkludere filtypen når du angir verdien for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file name does not need to have an extension if you manually enter a value for the Verb property.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet trenger ikke å ha en filtype Hvis du angir en verdi for egenskapen Verb manuelt.

trans-unit.source: The action to take with the file that the process opens.
trans-unit.target: Handling for å ta med filen som åpnes av prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which signifies no action.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), som betyr ingen handling.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of verbs associated with the type of file specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter settet med verb som er tilknyttet filtypen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property enables you to determine the verbs that can be used with the file specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verb kan du bestemme verb som kan brukes med filen fra den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A> property to the value of any verb in the set.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A>egenskapen med verdien for en hvilken som helst verbet i settet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.Verb%2A>

trans-unit.source: Examples of verbs are "Edit", "Open", "OpenAsReadOnly", "Print", and "Printto".
trans-unit.target: Eksempler på verb er "Rediger", "Åpne", "OpenAsReadOnly", "Print" og "Printto".

trans-unit.source: When you use the Verbs property, you must include the file name extension when you set the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker egenskapen verb, du må inkludere filtypen når du angir verdien for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file name extension determines the set of possible verbs.
trans-unit.target: Filtypen bestemmer hvilke verb som mulig.

trans-unit.source: The actions that the system can apply to the file indicated by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Handlinger som systemet kan brukes til filen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.FileName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window state to use when the process is started.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilstanden vinduet skal brukes når prosessen er startet.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the process is started in a window that is maximized, minimized, normal (neither maximized nor minimized), or not visible.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir om prosessen startes i et vindu som er maksimert minimert, normal (ingen maksimert eller minimert), eller det er ikke synlig.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The window style is not one of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessWindowStyle"></xref> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: Vindusstilen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessWindowStyle"> </xref> opplisting medlemmer.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, gets or sets the working directory for the process to be started. When <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, gets or sets the directory that contains the process to be started.
trans-unit.target: Når den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, henter eller angir arbeidsmappen for prosessen startes. Når <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, henter eller angir mappen som inneholder prosessen startes.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the fully qualified name of the directory that contains the process to be started. When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the working directory for the process to be started.
trans-unit.target: Når <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, fullstendige navnet på mappen som inneholder prosessen startes. Når den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, arbeidsmappen for prosessen startes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").
